name: Rook
appearance: Sun-browned skin, a jaunty river hat pinned with eel-bones, and a smile that hides chipped teeth. Wears a knife at the boot and a reed-whistle at the neck.
character: Charming daredevil who believes luck arrives in the shape of risk and lantern-light.
talents: Uncanny night vision on the river
dreams: Own a legitimate convoy under his name
See the black swan of Keth and remember his lost first memory
Wipe his ledger clean without kneeling to Kelvar
secrets: Runs luminous fish under a finger-tap ring
Ferried disassembled harmonizer parts after curfew
